Class DBHandler

java.lang.Object
DBHandler
public class DBHandler extends Object
DBHandler is a class that handles the interactions between the PoiseProjects application and the PoisePMS database.

  • Method Details

    • getDbHandler

      protected static DBHandler getDbHandler()
      The method that creates and returns only one instance of DBHandler.
      Returns:
      Returns only 1 instance of DBHandler.

    • readParties

      protected void readParties()
      A method that calls readParties(String type) with type as "Constractor", "Customer", and "Architect".

    • readProjects

      protected void readProjects()
      A method that reads the projects from PoisePMS and adds them to the projects list. These are the projects that are still ongoing.

    • writeParty

      protected void writeParty​(Map<String,​String> party)
      A method that takes the attributes of a Party and writes them to the database.
      Parameters:
      party - The attributes of the Party to write to the database.

    • writeProject

      protected void writeProject​(Map<String,​String> project)
      A method to wite Project Objects to the database.
      Parameters:
      project - The project to be written to the database.

    • writeCompletedPrjoject

      protected void writeCompletedPrjoject​(Map<String,​String> project)
      A method to write completed projects to the database.
      Parameters:
      project - The project to be written to the database.

    • updateProject

      protected void updateProject​(Map<String,​String> project)
      A method that updates the fields of a Project Object in the database.
      Parameters:
      project - The project to be written to the database.

    • removeProject

      protected void removeProject​(String proj_num, String erf)
      A method to remove a project record from the database.
      Parameters:
      proj_num - The project number of the project to be removed.
      erf - The ERF number of the project to be removed.
